column1: The funeral will be held Wednesday morning
column2: June 17th from the Barry J. Farrell Funeral Home
column4: followed by a Mass of Christian Burial in Our Lady of the Cross Church
column6: at 10:00 a.m. Burial will follow at Mater Dolorosa Cemetery
column7: South Hadley. A calling hour will be held Wednesday morning from 8:30 to 9:30 a.m.
